home.title: Stories of Art
home.subTitle: Calling all art lovers
home.p1: The Slovak National Gallery is creating a documentary series about artworks from the gallery's collection. We want to show that works of art are not only physical artifacts, but also reflections of the time and context in which they were created. In addition to the testimony of authors and publishers, we are also interested in authentic and unpublished stories of people. If you know the circumstances of a work, or the places and people depicted, please share your story with us. The most interesting stories will become part of the documentary and will be published as articles on Web umenia.
home.p2: You can get inspired by photography or paintings from our collection.
home.artworksButtonText: see 63 845 more artworks on Web umenia
